org.jgentleframework.context.beans
Interface FactoryBuilder

public interface FactoryBuilder

Interface to be implemented by beans that wish to build owning outjected instance.

Note: the implementation of this interface will be only effected to fields which is annotated with Outject and not effected to others (includes all setters of fields).

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
FactoryFilter

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getOutjectValue(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
          Invoked by the container before it outject an instance of current bean property back to container.
 

Method Detail

getOutjectValue

java.lang.Object getOutjectValue(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
Invoked by the container before it outject an instance of current bean property back to container. This method allows the bean instance to customize the outjected instance when the specified property need to be outjected.

Parameters:
field - the specified field is outjecting.
Returns:
returns the outjected instance according to the specified field.
